column4: Hey folks, I'm trying to get a friends Ubuntu laptop to access another friend's WindowsXP shared folder by following this: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/MountWindowsSharesPermanently Anyone know how I find out the name of the server and the share in Windows?
did you mount the smb share ?
-- I have to mount it first? Do you know how I do it?
easiest way I think is to use smb4k
- smb4k is saying smbmnt fails, it says "smbmnt must be installed suid root for direct user mounts"
